definition: everything is ready, all we need is an east wind (idiom)/lacking only one tiny crucial item/also written 萬事俱備，只欠東風|万事俱备，只欠东风
pinyin: wan4 shi4 jie1 bei4 , zhi3 qian4 dong1 feng1

sentences.english: Everything is ready except the east wind.
'All Ready' is used describe a situation when 'all is set and prepared for action'.
sentences.chinese: 是用以描述某事態已經‘萬事具備，只欠東風’了。
似乎萬事俱備只欠東風了。
